text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Without further ado—it begins!<n>Welcome to the Tracen
Academy<n>Pretty Grand Prix!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looks like our whimsical director has<n>cooked up another
new event. The<n>students gathered here in the gym<n>
immediately start chattering among<n>themselves.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Explanation! As Umamusume, you<n>must be strong both on
and off the<n>track!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Hence! You will compete in three<n>areas: performing, public
speaking,<n>and racing! The top four from the<n>preliminaries
will then vie for victory in<n>the finals!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Accepting entrants! From tomorrow,<n>you can enter yourself
or recommend<n>another! I await your courageous<n>
challenges!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: What a lov'ly event! City, I'll put your<n>name down for you!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Wait, Yukino?! Seriously?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Grand Prix are just da bomb, aren't<n>they? I'm gettin'
revved up just<n>imagining it! ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: (Sigh... Director Akikawa is backat it again...)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: (...I would love to see Groove excel in<n>the Grand Prix.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Pretty Grand Prix, huh? Leave it<n>up to the director to
come up with<n>something like this. Either way, it<n>doesn't
have much to do with Curren<n>Chan—

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Big Brooo! Get this, get this! ☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Big Siiis! Get this, get this! ☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Just now! I signed myself up for the<n>Grand Prix!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe! ♪ Like, it's called the Pretty<n>Grand Prix, right? It's an
event fit for<n>Curren, through and through—they<n>might as
well put my name on it!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Big Bro, make sure you cheer me on<n>looots, okay? ♪ You do
that, and I'll try<n>my bestest to win!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Big Sis, make sure you cheer me on<n>looots, okay? ♪ You do
that, and I'll try<n>my bestest to win!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad she's motivated... but I'm<n>also worried her Grand
Prix training<n>might get in the way of her normal<n>training.
choice_data_list:
Right now, the priority should be working on
your fundamentals...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I'll keep working on my<n>fundies. But at the
same time... the<n>Grand Prix is just as important to me!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
I mean, y'know! I need more people<n>to know how much of
a cutie-pie I am!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...Is clout really the only thing on her<n>mind? Once again, I feel
lost in the<n>dark when it comes to Curren Chan.
choice_data_list: So you're committed to the Grand Prix?
So you're committed to the Grand Prix?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Um, um! Big Bro, I wanna show you<n>my best.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Um, um! Big Sis, I wanna show you<n>my best.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Won't you let me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her cutesy tone makes it difficult for<n>me to make a decision.
This time<n>though, sensing a new air of<n>determination
around her, I reluctantly<n>agree.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That said, I can't keep letting her<n>push me around like this.
Resolved to<n>figure out what makes her tick, I pick<n>up my
phone and open her Umasta.

text_block_list.name: @Curren
text_block_list.text:
"Check out this Miracle Pegasus<n>Parfait I had today! ♪<n>
#FeelTheRainbow #CurrenSmile<n>#CuteCurrenChan"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, here's a selfie she posted of her<n>eating a parfait... Wait,
49,906 likes?!<n>Let's take a peek at the comments<n>
section...

text_block_list.name: @Curren_is_MyLife
text_block_list.text:
"Even though Curren posts at least<n>three times a day on
her Umasta, she<n>never drops a single clue about her<n>
private life."

text_block_list.name: @cuteeeeeCurren
text_block_list.text:
"I know, right? Usually, you can get a<n>general vibe of where
people live or<n>who they hang out with from their<n>photos."

text_block_list.name: @Curren_is_MyLife
text_block_list.text:
"She's a real enigma. Every photo is<n>always in a different
place with<n>different people. 'Course, that air of<n>mystery is
one of the things I love<n>about her!"

text_block_list.name: @UMA_hunter
text_block_list.text:
"I know the truth. Curren is actually<n>an alien. I mean, she's
way too<n>perfect to be human."

text_block_list.name: @UMA_hunter
text_block_list.text:
"Some of my buddies say she's an<n>UMA: Unidentified
Mysterious Angel.<n>They say she stays so cute by<n>sucking
the blood of others like a<n>chupacabra."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...That's enough internet for today.<n>The more I read about
Curren Chan,<n>the less I feel I know about her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, the day of the Pretty Grand<n>Prix preliminaries has
arrived. First up<n>is the performance section...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Everyone! Send me all your love and<n>support, okay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Emitting her usual superstar aura,<n>Curren Chan captivates
the crowd<n>and passes with flying colors.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The following public speaking section<n>goes about the same
way.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Today, I've brought an item that'll<n>make everyone even
cuter! ♪ My<n>personal recommendation is... this<n>golden
cream foundation!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The last part of the preliminary<n>involves a time trial race.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
All righty! Time to show my stuff! ♪<n>Make sure you catch
me shining—not<n>just with your eyes, but your<n>cameras
too!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Aieeek! We love you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren Chan has natural talent. As<n>long as she performs
like in practice,<n>she should be able to get a<n>respectable
time... Before long, the<n>race kicks off.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yeppity-yep, I'm feeling great! ♪<n>Everyone! Keep your eyes
on me—

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hm? That's weird...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Something's off about Curren<n>Chan's running form. Most
of the<n>spectators are so absorbed in her<n>cuteness that
they haven't noticed<n>yet, but I'm sure of it...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Eep!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her form is showing cracks! There's<n>no way she's beating
her old record<n>like this!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...At this rate—nnnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curren Chan powers past the finish<n>line, but her time leaves
something to<n>be desired. Still, thanks to her<n>previous two
scores, she manages to<n>qualify for the finals.

text_block_list.name: Serious Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Did you hear? Her cleat fell off her<n>shoe. It's proof she
slacked off on<n>her race prep.

text_block_list.name: Race-loving Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, looks like she couldn't care<n>less about racing. If she
wanted to be<n>an idol, she should've just gone<n>
somewhere else.

text_block_list.name: Fangirl Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Curren... I didn't want to see you like<n>this...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...Did Curren Chan overhear what<n>they were saying? Either
way, she's<n>curled up into a ball in front of the<n>finish line.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: ...Nope. Failing like this is no good.Getting carried away, embarrassingmyself... That's not cute.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: If this is the best I can do...

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I don't deserve... to be with Big Bro.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I don't deserve... to be with Big Sis.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I have a chance to say<n>anything, Curren Chan runs
off<n>somewhere. This loss hit her way<n>harder than I
thought it would...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't seem like the type of<n>person to let the
naysayers get to her.<n>But then, why was she so upset?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Turning back to the track, I spy<n>Curren Chan's lone cleat,
now only<n>faintly reflecting the brilliant light of<n>the sun.
